## ✅ Quick Checklist

### Testing
- [ ] Tests pass locally: `python run_coverage.py --console-only`
- [ ] Manual testing completed (if applicable)
- [ ] No breaking changes

### Quality
- [ ] Self-reviewed
- [ ] Follows existing code style
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets

### Documentation  
- [ ] Comments updated (if needed)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
